page.title: 12Pubs in Kirk Merrington.
page.content: The pubs open for 8-9 hours a day from around 11am. till 3pm. and 6pm till 10.30pm. The opening hours are less on Sundays. Customers are allowed 10 minutes to{'drink-up"}after the closing bell.{"Last Orders"}are called 5 minutes before closing time. The beer is kept in{kegs}in the cellars at 50 degrees Fahrenheit. It is delivered from the brewery about once a week and the barrels are rolled into the cellars down a stairway ramp. The price of beer is between 65 pence and 75 pence per pint; spirits sell for 70 pence a measure and wine for 60 pence a glass. Each pub has its own car park but drivers have to beware not to drink too much or they may be stopped by the police and{breathalised.
